text: Tissue samples were fixed in 4 % paraformaldehyde in PBS , embedded in paraffin , sectioned ( 4 - mm thickness ) , and stained with hematoxylin and eosin ( H & E ) . Staining with periodic acid - Schiff stain , Azan stain , silver , or Oil - red - O was also performed to visualize glycogen degeneration , fibrillization , reticular fiber degeneration , or lipid degeneration , respectively .
